H3.text: Who directed the Noughties films One Day in September, The Last King of Scotland and Touching the Void. KEVIN MACDONALD

A4.text: Kevin MacDonald (evolutionary psychologist) (born 1944) is an American white supremacist, conspiracy theorist, and evolutionary psychologist.

A5.text: One Day in September is directed by Kevin Macdonald.
